recommendations: Dilshaad Hossain (she/her) “During Karan's stint at Child Rights and You, East, he was given the responsibility to procure funds for the underprivileged children to help them out during the pandemic. He was successful in completing the task and displayed convincing communication skills throughout and worked strategically. He was open to learning and feedback and focused on delivering outcomes. I wish him the best for his future endeavours! ”

SRINATH IYER “Karan's concepts on any relevant topic is strong and he uses it aptly to perform consistently. His focus on domain knowledge development and good communication skills allows one to have fruitful, productive and technologically sound conversations with him.”
